div.bibl: Illinois Staats-Zeitung, Oct. 23, 1867. BULLETIN FROM REPUBLICAN HEADQUARTERS

body.p: The Republican headquarters at 76 La Salle Street announces that the several candidates met and appointed members to various campaign committees. Committees were set up in each of Chicago's fifteen wards. [Names of Germans who were appointed to each ward committee are omitted in translation.] The County Campaign Committee meets at the headquarters every day after ten o'clock. The local committees are asked to confer with the County Committee as often as is necessary.
